Text.SourceString: Choose a hero to "invite" to the Monster Pit. Adding heroes to the pit increases its XP and level. Only one version of each hero can be in the Monster Pit at a time.
Text.LocalizedString: Choose a hero to "invite" to the Monster Pit. Adding heroes to the pit increases its XP and level. Only one version of each hero can be in the Monster Pit at a time.
